name: Island Showdown
description:
Island Showdown

Game for NUS GDG Game Jam

by Vivian, Nguyen, Edwin, Alvis, Saucey_ytp, Parnikkapore, Jun Yang

09/10/2022 12:00 - 20:00 

Game Jam Assets

Assets by analogStudios_

https://analogstudios.itch.io/

Fire Pixel Bullet 16x16 by blackdragon1727 

https://blackdragon1727.itch.io/fire-pixel-bullet-16x16

Game Description

Start a 1v1 battle with your friend on the island and destroy your opponent with your sword and bullets. Who will be the winner of this showdown? 

Game Controls

Press any key to start the game

Press Esc to restart the game 

Player 1: 

- Move: WASD

- Fire bullets: E

- Swing sword: Q

- Dash: 2

Player 2: 

- Move: Arrow keys

- Fire bullets: Shift

- Swing sword: Enter

- Dash: Ctrl

Features

- 3 lives, 1 winner 

- Play safe and shoot the bullets to damage your opponent, or take the risk and damage them even more with your sword! 

- Defeat randomly spawned slimes on the island for a chance to gain health restoration, double attack power, or double speed! 

Engine used

Godot 3.5

Some Known Issues (Fixed on 09/11/2022)

- Poor slime gets stuck 

- The double-speed item sometimes doesn't work 

- Sometimes player becomes invincible after death
